title: COVID-19 Vaccinations | Borrego Health
description: Borrego Health is offering coronavirus (COVID-19) vaccinations and booster shots. Our current vaccinations are by appointment only. Call 438-802-7727 to make your appointment today.
cleaned_text: top of page We are here to serve you 24/7 at [(855) 436-1234](tel:+1-855-4361234) For referral inquiries please call [(760) 281-8444](tel:760-281-8444) COVID-19 TESTING AND VACCINATION EVENTS Borrego Health is offering COVID-19 Testing and Vaccination events in the counties of Riverside and San Diego. If you are experiencing symptoms of COVID-19 and/or have been exposed to a person that is known to have COVID-19, you are encouraged to call our triage line [855-436-1234](tel:855-436-1234). We can set up a telehealth assessment to determine if you need to be tested. Call [438-802-7727](tel:438-802-7727) for questions or to make an appointment for your COVID-19 vaccination or booster shot. Appointments are usually required, but check location and event listings for possible walk-in availability. Select your region below to view COVID-19 testing and vaccination locations and events near you. *Vaccination will be offered depending on eligibility and supply availability. bottom of page
